name: Tusok Match-3
description:
Are you craving for Kwek-kwek? Fishball? Kikiam? Well, play this game!

Tusok Match-3 is a three-match game where the goal is to move, shift, or rotate the objects inside a tile to achieve a three-in-a-row. This game is made in partial fulfillment for Game Programming 3. 

Developers:

Del Valle, Monty - Project Manager

Famadico, Carl - Artist

Mistica, Hannah - Artist/Programmer

Obzunar, Nic  - Programmer
